vector< Matrix< double > * > &  targets,
uint  epochs,
double  threshold 
) [inline]

Train the network against N input patterns and N target patterns for `epochs` training loops OR until the `threshold` error value is reached .

Parameters:

targets Target training set .
epochs Maximum number of epochs to use for network training .
